column4: does anyone  know why aptitude won't connect to the internet for updates or new packages?
first guese would be proxy settings
thanks, i will try to have a look
It's set to direct internet connection, does it need to be changed?
My proxy's set to direct internet connection, does it need to be changed?
no, I get this message in apt-get: Unable to fetch some archives, maybe run apt-get update or try with --fix-missing?
THis message appears: E: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.
apt can have its own proxy settings differnt from the system settings.  I rarely use the proxies. No idea how it could have gotten set accidentlyt
Same, I only use a direct connection to the interne
'direct conection' in network manager id a differnt proxy setting then what apt might be trying to do.  or there could be a differnt issue going on.
it could be the old ppas i'm using. I'll remove those and see what happens
the apt-get service now works for me; literally by kicking my tower
might have to consider opening a bug on launchpad
steam works.. some bugs exist.. not all games work
